title: Trade war with penguins? Trump hits 10% tariff on Heard and McDonald Islands near Antarctica with 0% human population
description:
World leaders react to Trump tariffs

US President Donald Trump is imposing reciprocal tariffs on over 100 countries and wait, for it, penguins!

As the shock of the most aggressive trade policy sinks in, details are emerging from the famous charts that US President flaunted during his 50-minute spe...
